shortDescription: A CWE-119:Improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer vulnerability exists in PowerLogic ION8650, ION8800, ION7650, ION7700/73xx, and ION83xx/84xx/85xx/8600 (see security notifcation for affected versions), which could cause the meter to reboot.
vulnerabilityName: Schneider Electric powerlogic_ion8650_firmware Improper Restriction of Operations within the Bounds of a Memory Buffer
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
